scripts.build:tiles: cd resources/tiles && convert tile.png -resize 1400x560^ -gravity center -extent 1400x560 tile-1400x560.png && convert tile.png -resize 920x680^ -gravity center -extent 920x680 tile-920x680.png && convert tile.png -resize 440x280^ -gravity center -extent 440x280 tile-440x280.png
